content.rendered:
Our team’s unparalleled technical and commercial expertise make us a trusted resource during the due diligence phase, for those parties who are looking to make an investment decision as to whether to finance or underwrite the purchase of a vessel, a fleet, a port or a harbour.

AqualisBraemar undertakes technical due diligence studies on behalf of private equity and debt financiers in support of the purchase of vessels, fleets, companies, newbuilds and sale/leaseback options covering analysis of OPEX and CAPEX assumptions, management capabilities and performance, condition of hardware and uplift requirements, regulatory and compliance reviews, forward technology assessments and long-term capitalisation needs.

Our experience of managing repairs, conversion and newbuild projects positions us to be able to accurately advise on the technical aspects of those projects and the suitability of facilities that are proposed for those projects.

excerpt.rendered: AqualisBraemar offer technical due diligence to owners and financial institutions to assess the project risk prior to the project execution; during the construction phase; prior to consolidation; and prior to acquisition of an asset.
